info.name: MM CRYPTO API 1.0
info.description:
# Source Code

[MM Crypto Website](www.mmcrypto.org)

[Github](https://github.com/ElMoufid-Mohamed)

## RESPONSE CODES

* 401 - Unauthorized
* 404 - Not Found
* 200 - OK
* 204 - No Content / Created (OK)

## Authorization

Bear Tokens (Auth0 Acces Tokens)

request.description:
# Response Array Of Assets
Key Type Description
Id Number Id Of Object
Symbol String Symbol Of Asset
Name String Full Name Of Asset
Website String URL Of The Website
Fork Asset Object Fork Asset

response.name: All Assets

request.description:
# Response Array Of Assets
Key Type Description
Id Number Id Of Object
Symbol String Symbol Of Asset
Name String Full Name Of Asset
Website String URL Of The Website
Fork Asset Object Fork Asset

# Response One Asset
Key Type Description
Id Number Id Of Object
Symbol String Symbol Of Asset
Name String Full Name Of Asset
Website String URL Of The Website
Fork Asset Object Fork Asset

# Response One Founder
Key Type Description
Id Number Id Of Founder
FirstName String First Name Of Founder
LastName String Last Name Of Founder
Gender Char Gender Of Founder

# Response Array Of Wallets
Key Type Description
Id Number Id Of Wallet
Brand String Manufacturer of Wallet
Model String Model Of Wallet
Price Number Price Of Wallet In USD
Website String (URL) Website Of Manufacturer
ImageURL String (URL) Url To The Image of Wallet
Category String Category Of Wallet (Hardware/Software)

# Response Array Of Assets
Key Type Description
Id Number Id Of Object
Symbol String Symbol Of Asset
Name String Full Name Of Asset
Website String URL Of The Website
Fork Asset Object Fork Asset
